name: VIDEO: County Connection – January 2020
description: In this episode, see how Department of Public Works clears the roads when it rains, how 150 foster families are setting up new computers, how a drum is therapeutic, how come County employees saved a co-workers life, and how the County can help you keep those New Years resolutions for 2020.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: In this episode, see how Department of Public Works clears the roads when it rains, how 150 foster families are setting up new computers, how a drum is therapeutic, how some County employees saved a co-workers life, and how the County can help you keep those New Years resolutions for 2020.

about.description: Not Evaluated--Notice has no relation to COVID-19, not even an indirect or cursory relationship.
